Package fr.islandswars.api.task

Annotation Type Updater

  • @Documented
@Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target(METHOD)
public @interface Updater
    File Updater located on fr.islandswars.api.task Updater is a part of Islands Wars - Api.

    Copyright (c) 2017 - 2018 Islands Wars.

    Islands Wars - Api is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

    This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

    You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program. If not, see GNU GPL license.

    Since:
    0.2.4

    Show that this method needs to be scheduled, one or multiples time, in async or not, with delayed or not

    Author:
    Valentin Burgaud (Xharos), <xharos@islandswars.fr> Created the 02/01/2018 at 17:15

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element Description
      TaskType type
      All bukkit interactions need to be run inside the main thread, declared with the sync tag

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
      int delayed
      Set a time before run this task (in ticks where 1 seconds equals 20 ticks)
      int delta
      Use this parameters when using a task that needs to be repeated and TimeType doesn't give you exact update time
      TimeType time
      Set an unit according to the delta()

    • Element Detail

      • type

        TaskType type
        All bukkit interactions need to be run inside the main thread, declared with the sync tag
        Returns:
        this task tag

      • delayed

        int delayed
        Set a time before run this task (in ticks where 1 seconds equals 20 ticks)
        Returns:
        the time in tick before run this task
        Default:
        -1

      • delta

        int delta
        Use this parameters when using a task that needs to be repeated and TimeType doesn't give you exact update time
        Returns:
        the time between each call
        See Also:
        time()
        Default:
        -1

      • time

        TimeType time
        Set an unit according to the delta()
        Returns:
        the time type used
        Default:
        fr.islandswars.api.task.TimeType.NONE
